#summary Bug report how-to
#labels Featured

If the application works incorrectly or crashes (unexpeted terminates), please fill a report in the [http://code.google.com/p/ichabber/issues/list Issues]. For unexpeted terminate applications check the log files that are located to {{{ /Library/Logs/CrashReporter/iChabber-*.plist }}} into device file system. Then, attach these files to your report
